name: AustinResourceRecoveryPickupSchedule
0:
”Alexa, ask Austin Resource Recovery what's being picked up this week.”
”Alexa, ask Austin Resource Recovery when my next collection is.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: austin resource recovery
des:
Do you often forget whether this week is trash and recycling week, or just trash week? What happens to your pickup schedule on a holiday? Sure, you could check the Austin Resource Recovery website but there's an easier way!

Now you can simply ask your Alexa device about your next Austin Resource Recovery pickup event! This skill will tell you:
- What pickup events are upcoming within the next week
- What services are included in your upcoming pickup(s)

This skill uses the address you've configured for the device you're invoking the skill from to determine what your collection schedule is.
